attributes.action: introduce yearly  licensing for ALL animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog licensing is a fantastic idea; but why should other animals miss out?

Bring in a system for licensing all mammals, birds and reptiles; licences should be renewed yearly.

Licences should differ in price for the various animals e.g. a licence for a large dog would cost more than that for a smaller breed, which in turn would cost more that that for a small     mammal.  Price should also depend on how difficult it is to keep an animal e.g. a  licence for a hamster would be cheaper
than that for an iguana.

If a licence isn't renewed the animal(s) will be removed from the owner & re-homed through a shelter which home-checks all applicants to ensure they are responsible and suitable.
